item.description:
This hike will be located in the central part of the forest covering a variety of terrain. The route will go though rolling hills, pine barrens, open fields, some ponds and be in wildlife mangement aeas. The route will be on lightly used fire roads and will be dog friendly.
Meet at 9:45 at parking lot adjacent to fire tower at junction of Bare Hill and Three Cornered Roads for 10AM start. (same location as October hike)
Directions: From park HQ, follow signs to Barrett and Curlew Ponds on Bare Hill Road - about 2 miles. Hike will start on opposite side of road from parking lot.
Hike distance < 4 miles, but terrain is a bit hillier than on some previous hikes.
Hike will be done in time for 1PM Patriots game.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: First November Sunday Hike
